name: You're Fired
description:
You're Fired is a game where you shape the future of people, deciding whether to dismiss them!
With each passing day lists of people that it needs to dismiss will refill.
For example sleeping men and slovens. Similarly you will be able to make crucial decisions that will entail consequences. You have no more than 40 seconds to dismiss or leave your employees.
You can't go wrong in your choice!
